1.text: Apply a clear base coat first to protect your nails.

2.text: Check the ingredients to avoid certain dyes.

3.text: Limit how often you use nail hardeners.

4.text: Opt for lighter nail polishes instead of dark shades.

5.text: Spread cuticle oil on your fingers to avoid polish stains.

6.text: Place a soaked cotton ball on your nail for 30 seconds.

7.text: Slide the cotton ball down the nail to remove the polish.
